learning_objectives.description: Describe the processes and aims of carrying out various cyber security threats.
learning_objectives.notes_and_guidance: Includes brute-force attack, data interception, DDoS, hacking, malware (virus, worm, Trojan, spyware, adware, ransomware), pharming, phishing, social engineering.

learning_objectives.description: Explain how solutions help keep data safe from security threats.
learning_objectives.notes_and_guidance: Includes access levels, anti-malware (anti-virus, anti-spyware), authentication (password, biometrics, two-step verification), automated updates, checking communications and URLs, firewalls, privacy settings, proxies, SSL.
